H0.text: What was the name of the IBM computer that defeated world chess champion Garry Kasparov in 1997. Chessmaster

H1.text: What was the name of the IBM computer that defeated world chess champion Garry Kasparov in 1997. Bigbrain

H2.text: What was the name of the IBM computer that defeated world chess champion Garry Kasparov in 1997. Checkmate

H3.text: What was the name of the IBM computer that defeated world chess champion Garry Kasparov in 1997. Deepblue

A4.text: Deep Blue was the name of the IBM computer that defeated world chess champion Garry Kasparov in 1997.

A5.text: The IBM computer that defeated Garry Kasparov in 1997 was renamed from Deep Thought to Deep Blue in 1989.
